scripts.export: npm run export-png && npm run export-eps && npm run export-svg
scripts.export-png: sketchtool export artboards index.sketch --output=./exports/artboards/png/ --formats=png && sketchtool export layers index.sketch --output=./exports/layers/png/ --formats=png && sketchtool export slices index.sketch --output=./exports/slices/png/ --formats=png
scripts.export-eps: sketchtool export artboards index.sketch --output=./exports/artboards/eps/ --formats=eps && sketchtool export layers index.sketch --output=./exports/layers/eps/ --formats=eps && sketchtool export slices index.sketch --output=./exports/slices/eps/ --formats=eps
scripts.export-svg: sketchtool export artboards index.sketch --output=./exports/artboards/svg/ --formats=svg && sketchtool export layers index.sketch --output=./exports/layers/svg/ --formats=svg && sketchtool export slices index.sketch --output=./exports/slices/svg/ --formats=svg
scripts.precommit: npm run export && npm run dump
